questions.question_text: Which of the following protocols BEST protects end-to-end communication of personal data?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
SFTP is secure but limited to file transfers. On the other hand, TLS is a general-purpose protocol that provides security for a wide range of communication types. TLS can secure email, http, and more

questions.question_text: A global organization is planning to implement a customer relationship management (CRM) system to be used in offices based in multiple countries. Which of the following is the MOST important data protection consideration for this project?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
